★★★★★
★★★★★
28 Apr 2016, By D Sriram Pavan, On flipkart.com
Amazing product from toshiba

thanks flipkart for wonderful packing and quick delivery.. laptop is stylish, fast and with 2gb graphics card and worth every penny.. only problem i faced so far is letter n not getting typed easily... rest all fine... got it for 30500 and its a superb deal... would have been excellent if flipkart provided backpack... but not a big probs... we can get backpacks easily everywhere.... volume is bit on lower side.. update after 1 month usage,, 1. As stated above laptop is stylish and fast 2, i got the silver colour laptop and the glossy silver is susceptible to scratches easily.. so better to buy and apply a decal or laptop skin,, 3. Battery pack up is okay,, (could be better) but getting 3 to 3 and half hours depending on usage,, 4, keypad is excellent except letter N is giving some trouble to me 5, bluetooth is very good,,, touch pad is good, 6, usb 3 is awesome and offering superb speed - using WD passport external hard disk 7, got 1 year warranty and 2 years extended warranty as a part of the offer and very happy and tension free,,, little bit heating is there,, but thats okay,, not a big deal and volume is on lower side,,, one way to conclude,,, its a beauty and the beast,,,and very good choice especially with 2 years extended warranty,, CANT comment about gaming because yet to play any high end gaming,, but with NVIDIA geforce 2gb graphics i am pretty sure its a good gaming stuff,,, update.. CONS.. 1, Got keypad malfunctioning problem after 4-5 months of usage,, some keys are not responding or sometimes functioning weird, (for eg,, whenever i type key R, number 5 or some weird symbols appear on screen,,) but with 3 years warranty i hope i will get it repaired under free warranty and hoping good response from the service center,, will update again after service,, APART FROM THIS MINOR COMPLAINT EVERYTHING IS FINE AND AMAZED AT THE BATTERY PACKUP,, TOTALLY SATISFIED WITH THE PRODUCT,, CLOSE YOUR EYES AND TAKE THIS LAPTOP IF U R LOOKING AT THIS PRICE RANGE,,,, AND THE SPECIFICATIONS MEETS YOUR REQUIREMENTS,, THANK U TOSHIBA AND FLIPKART....

★★★★★
09 Aug 2016, By Rahul, On flipkart.com
Great product

Good packing and fast delivery..Good product configurations in this prize range . Did not fully satisfy with the make quality of laptop body. Feels like toy plastic so not recommend for rough use.Performance is very good.

1 users found this review helpful helpful?
★★★★★
★★★★★
04 May 2016, By Bikas Das, On flipkart.com
Awesome product in this budget

OK. I have received the product. After researching and choosing a long list of produucts, I have finally decided to buy this one. At first I was thinking to buy sony laptop. the Pro is you are getting a genuine OS by that. But anyway, most of us will not buy any software required not even me. So bought this one. About this laptop. Build quality nice. looks are nice. I had some problems during installation and sorted it out. Now about performance. Just good. I am playing NFS The Run for two days. Not a single lag. And heat produced during gaming. It cools only in 5 minutes. one tip if you yourself install the OS. Install the PCI Communication driver before installing the Bluetooth drivers. Else your system might go to repair mode after reboot. I think others provide 6 months warranty for battery. But Toshiba provides 1 year for battery too. So if you want to buy it, go for it without hesitation.

★★★★★
22 Aug 2014, By Palash Choudhury, On flipkart.com
Good Product, Bad Sales Team of Toshiba

The product is pretty good and at such a low price, it couldn't get better. But before purchasing, I contacted sales team of Toshiba and they said that the extended warranty is valid with it. But after purchase the service team says it isn't.
